Description: Sheet of papyrus with hieratic text in black ink; funerary text, the composition numbered 'Book of the Dead chapter 166' by Pleyte (an independent composition in 21st Dynasty burials).
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: William John Bankes
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134652) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134652)
Taylor et al 2011 / The history and conservation of the papyrus of Tuy (p.98)
